short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Directly read columnists of Gozcu Newsletter from Turkey

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy to read columnist of The Sozcu newspaper (Turkish) daily. Very basic extension, click and read current date columns. Version 2023.0.3 has read at place feature. This extension parse html and render only text version of the column. Very fast and easy to read.
This last version includes text to speech feature. You can listen column now.
